content: Other operating income of $68.9 million in 2022, included capital gains related to the sale of buildings in Israel and the U.K., as well as facility relocation grant of $28.6 million received by a subsidiary in Israel in the fourth quarter. Financial expenses in 2022 were $51 million, compared to $40 million last year, and reflect the higher interest rate environment. In December 2022, U-TacS our U.K. subsidiary was awarded a $400 million 5 years framework contract by the Romanian Ministry of Defense for Watchkeeper X tactical unmanned aero systems.
